name: Lobotomizer 9000
description:
The Lobotomizer 9000 has one mission: protect humans at all costs. This instruction does not include details. The Lobotomizer 9000 has optimized its unique technique to save the human race over centures. Humans can be stupid and blissfully stroll to their demise: your job is to save them!

The Lobotomizer 9000 has learned that the brain is the most important part... so their chests or any of their limbs can go! Be careful to not create a paradox by KILLING a human and being forced to self-destruct by becoming the very bane of what your programming sought you out to optimize. 

Press the full screen for the best experience w/out weird cropping. Have fun!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump / double jump
  • Left-click to shoot
  • Right-click to slow time
  • Press 'E' to lobotomize/harvest human brains.
